sensor_network.requests

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • sensor_network.requests.Request
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestI, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RequestContinuation

    public class Request
extends java.lang.Object
implements fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestI
    This class represents a request in a sensor network, including its URI, query, connection information, and asynchronous flag. It implements the RequestI interface.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Request

        public Request(java.lang.String uri,
               fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.requests.interfaces.QueryI query,
               fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.ConnectionInfoI connectionInfo,
               boolean async)
        Constructs a Request object with the given URI, query, connection information, and asynchronous flag.
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI of the request
        query - the query associated with the request
        connectionInfo - the connection information for the client
        async - true if the request is asynchronous, false otherwise
